data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barbosa, Marina Ferraz De Camargo, Oconnor, Barry M., Moraes, Gilberto José De (2016): A new species of Thyreophagus (Acari: Acaridae) from Brazil, with notes on species associated with stored food and human habitats and a key to species of this genus. Zootaxa 4088 (2): 279-291, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4088.2.9
